shortdesc.ph: Gets the user information by passing in the user account.

section.p: After a remote user joins the channel, the SDK gets the UID and user account of the remote user, caches them in a mapping table object (`userInfo`), and triggers this callback on the local client.

After receiving the o\ref agora::rtc::IRtcEngineEventHandler::onUserInfoUpdated "onUserInfoUpdated" callback, you can call this method to get the user ID of the remote user from the `userInfo` object by passing in the user account.

plentry.pd: The user account. It is mandatory.
